job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of software development, including design, implementation, and maintenance of software.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of building and verifying software components, which falls under software development and testing.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with a Product Owner to understand and refine requirements, aligning technical work with business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code review are established software development practices aimed at improving code quality and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly refers to the application of established software engineering principles and practices for building quality software.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and exploratory activities can be related to model development, but in the context of NX CAM software, it leans more towards software design and exploration of new features rather than core AI/ML model training.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development for NX CAM software, including design, development, testing, and collaboration. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
